snippet.title: Whipseey and The Lost Atlas - Coming Soon!
snippet.description:
In Whipseey and The Lost Atlas you play as Alex, a young boy who’s curiosity has landed him in a world of trouble, After finding himself lost in a strange world and being transformed into a magical creature named +9Whipseey, he must solve the mystery of the Lost Atlas to return to his original form and go back home.

Coming Soon to Steam, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch.
